Key Match Events: Cameroon won the match with a score of 4-1 against Kenya.
Pre-Game Insights: Cameroon are unbeaten in four matches across World Cup and AFCON qualifying duties since their continental exit at the hands of Nigeria in late January.
Kenya have been unbeaten in eight of nine involvements across all competitions after ending 2023 on a rough patch.
Cameroon have no defeats from four prior encounters against Kenya, albeit with the most recent encounter coming in a friendly encounter some 14 years ago.
Post-Match Reflections: Bryan Mbeumo is in red-hot form at the moment, and the Brentford man—currently on a three-game scoring streak—will be looking to deliver the goods for Cameroon.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cameroon have the opportunity to claim sole ownership of the group with two meetings against Kenya to come three days apart.
Kenya have recorded five clean sheets since the turn of the year and will need that defensive solidity to come to the fore when they take to the field on Friday.
Others: The match took place at the Japoma Stadium on Friday evening.
The Indomitable Lions are unbeaten in four matches across World Cup and AFCON qualifying duties since their continental exit at the hands of Nigeria in late January.
